DOC.brief_summary: Little known clinical significance chronic alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) elevation HIV-infected patient without hepatitis B C coinfection . Study aim first evaluate prevalence liver fibrosis cirrhosis HIV-infected patient chronic ALT elevation chronic viral hepatitis use non-invasive diagnostic test second find associated factor significant fibrosis cirrhosis . In second longitudinal part intend assess fibrosis progression within 1 3 year .
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Liver Fibrosis Progression Liver Fibrosis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Case patient : HIV1 infection hepatitis B C coinfection chronic alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) elevation 1.1.2007 sign informed consent common cause liver disease Control patient : HIVinfection hepatitis B C coinfection ALT elevation 1.1.2002 , date ALT value regularly collect Swiss HIV Cohort Study ( SHCS ) know chronic liver disease Exclusion criterion : please see inclusion criterion
